Desc.entry: The Drug Interventions Programme is funded by the Home Office to provide case management for drug users in the criminal justice system:  facilitates their treatment programme  provides an aftercare service for all adults completing a treatment programme locally or returning to Sheffield after treatment  provides a telephone helpline 24hrs a day to provide access to treatment, advice, information and support. Clients must be aged over 18 years and can self-refer.

Telephone.entry: Single point of contact for professional referrals only

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-4.30pm, drop-in for DIP duty worker
